description: Open tabs, websites, and links in automatically managed disposable containers. Containers isolate the data websites store (cookies, cache, and more) from each other, further enhancing your privacy while you browse.
name: Temporary Containers

browser_action.default_title: Open a new tab in a new Temporary Container

new_temporary_container_tab.description: Open a new tab in a new Temporary Container

new_same_container_tab.description: Open a new tab in the same Container as the current tab. Enable in Advanced Preferences > Keyboard shortcuts

new_no_container_tab.description: Open a new 'No Container' tab. Enable in Advanced Preferences > Keyboard shortcuts

new_no_container_window_tab.description: Open a new 'No Container' tab in a new Window. Enable in Advanced Preferences > Keyboard shortcuts

new_temporary_container_tab_current_url.description: Open current tab URL in a new Temporary Container tab. Enable in Advanced Preferences > Keyboard shortcuts

new_no_history_tab.description: Open a new tab in a new 'Deletes History Temporary Container'. History permissions under Advanced Preferences > Delete History must be given

toggle_isolation.description: Toggle Isolation ON and OFF. Enable in Advanced Preferences > Keyboard shortcuts
